stripped_text: If the Runner is tagged, Drone Screen gains "Whenever the Runner initiates a run on this server, Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 meat damage (cannot be prevented)."
text: If the Runner is tagged, Drone Screen gains "Whenever the Runner initiates a run on this server, Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 meat damage (cannot be prevented)."
title: Drone Screen
